question: The Uttar Pradesh Government is to set up a new University after the name of which Indian Freedom Fighter?
explanation: The Uttar Pradesh Government is to set a new university in Aligarh named after Raja Mahendra Pratap Singh. He was a freedom fighter, journalist, writer, and Marxist revolutionary social reformist of India and President of first Provisional Government of India. He also formed the Executive Board of India in Japan in 1940 during the Second World War.
